text: Bizir kam bagha, kɨ Timoti ia bagha anemada. A nan otarimɨn mɨn iti, ezɨ kɨ bar a gɨfonge. An Ekiamɨn ingangarim deragha an gari. Kɨ kamaghɨn ifonge, a nan arazir kɨ Kraisɨn poroghav ikia amir arazibar gun ia mɨkɨmam. Arazir kabara, kɨ zurara nguibaba bar dar ghua, siosba bar dar men sure gami. Eghtɨ, Timoti arazir kabar ia mɨkɨm, ian nɨghnɨzibar amutɨ, da dɨkavam.
